hero.title: Imikhiqizo Yakho. Ilinki Eyodwa Yekhathalogi. Ama-odela e-WhatsApp.
hero.subtitle: Layisha imikhiqizo yakho, yabelana ngelinki yekhathalogi yakho, futhi uthole ama-odela ahlelekile nge-WhatsApp. Yakhelwe abathengisi beSA nabadayisi.

features.title: Konke Okudingayo Ukudayisa Ngokuhlakanipha
features.subtitle: Shintsha ama-voice notes nezithombe ezisakazekile ze-WhatsApp ngekhathalogi yemikhiqizo ehloniphekile.

whatsapp.title: Ukukhokha Nge-WhatsApp Kuqala
whatsapp.description: Abathengi babhrowuza ikhathalogi yakho futhi bathumele ama-odela ahlelekile ngqo ku-WhatsApp yakho — akudingeki ukulanda uhlelo lokusebenza.

mobile.title: Isebenza Kunoma Yiliphi Ifoni
mobile.description: Ikhathalogi yakho ilayisha ngokushesha kunoma yiliphi i-smartphone. Iklanyelwe abathengi baseSA abasebenzisa idatha.

variants.title: Izinhlobonhlobo Zemikhiqizo
variants.description: Engeza ubukhulu, imibala, nezinketho ezingokwezifiso. Landelela isitoko ngohlobo ngalunye.

analytics.title: Yazi Izinombolo Zakho
analytics.description: Bona ukuthi yimiphi imikhiqizo ethola ukubukwa, futhi landelela ukusebenza kwakho kokudayisa.

import.title: Ukulayisha Okuningi
import.description: Layisha amakhulu emikhiqizo ngesikhathi esisodwa nge-CSV. Akudingeki uyengeze ngayinye.

marketplace.title: Ukutholakala Emakethe
marketplace.description: Tholwa abathengi abasha. Imikhiqizo yakho ivela emakethe ye-TradeFeed nabanye abadayisi baseSA.

items.a: Abathengi babhrowuza ikhathalogi yakho ku-inthanethi, bengeza izinto ekalini yabo, bese becindezela 'Thumela I-Odela ku-WhatsApp'. Lokhu kuvula i-WhatsApp nomlayezo ohlelekile.

items.q: Ingabe abathengi bami badinga ukulanda uhlelo lokusebenza?
items.a: Cha. Ikhathalogi yakho yikhasi lewebhu elisebenza kunoma yiliphi ibhrawuza le-mobile. Abathengi bavele bavule ilinki oyabelana ngayo ku-WhatsApp.
Yebo. Idatha yesitolo ngasinye ihlukaniswe ngokuphelele. Asikho esinye isitolo esingabona imikhiqizo yakho noma ulwazi lwamakhasimende. Sihambisana ne-POPIA.
Yebo impela. Iplani Yamahhala ikuvumela ukufaka imikhiqizo engu-10 ngokukukhokha okugcwele kwe-WhatsApp. Akudingeki ikhadi lokuboleka.
Samukela izinkokhelo nge-PayFast — isango sokukhokha esethenjwayo saseNingizimu Afrika.
Yebo! Abadayisi be-Pro bangalayisha ifayela le-CSV ukulayisha amakhulu emikhiqizo ngesikhathi esisodwa.
I-TradeFeed yakhelwe eNingizimu Afrika, ngeNingizimu Afrika. Siyakuqonda ukuphithizela kwase-Jeppe Street.
Bhalisa, dala isitolo sakho, layisha umkhiqizo wakho wokuqala, bese wabelana ngelinki yekhathalogi yakho. Kuthatha imizuzu engaphansi kwemihlanu.

cta.title: Ukulungele Ukudayisa Ngokuhlakanipha?
cta.subtitle: Hlangana nabathengisi baseSA asebevele besebenzisa i-TradeFeed ukuphatha izikhathalogi zabo.

marketplace.title: Imakethe
marketplace.subtitle: Thola imikhiqizo kubadayisi abaphezulu baseNingizimu Afrika
marketplace.noResultsHint: Zama ukusesha okwehlukile noma ulungise izihluzi zakho.

errors.unexpectedError: Kwenzeke iphutha elingalindelekile. Ithimba lethu lazisiwe.
errors.offlineDesc: Hlola uxhumano lwakho lwe-inthanethi bese uzama futhi. Ikali yakho nokuthandayo kugcinwe — kuzoba lapha uma ubuya.
